messages.title: THE NEXT ELECTION: THE CLEAREST CHOICE IN A GENERATION
messages.content: Every vote not cast for Alok Sharma and the Conservatives in Reading West, makes it more likely that Ed Miliband will become Prime Minister and the country will end up with a Labour government.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Over the past five years have helped to deliver millions of pounds of government infrastructure investment for Reading's road and rail networks.
Worked with local schools and parent groups to deliver extra government funding and ensure more school places being created for all children.
Supported businesses like the Tesco Distribution Centre in Whitley to create new jobs in Reading. Promises to help deliver more jobs and continue to speak up for local businesses in Parliament.
Successfully campaigned to increase the number of Standard Class seats on Great Western trains and promises to continue to help deliver increased investment in rail to help alleviate overcrowding.
Working with local campaign groups to fight unsustainable development plans like Pincents Hill and worked to secure an undevelopment designation on the Bath Road Reservoir site.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Every vote not cast for Alok Sharma and the Conservatives in Reading West, makes it more likely that Ed Miliband will become Prime Minister.

issues.economy: Conservatives are for reducing the deficit and labour is for more spending, more borrowing.

politicalExperience.achievements: Delivered millions of pounds of government infrastructure investment for Reading's road and rail networks.
